text: Crazy Monkey Studios is an independent video game development studio. Founded in 2010 and renamed Rogueside in 2020. Crazy Monkey Studios originally had its office in Contich, Belgium until 2018, when it moved to Geel, Belgium. == History == Crazy Monkey Studios was founded in 2010 by Steven Verbeek and Martin Holtkamp after they met at a gaming conference. With limited resources, they created Empire and launched it on iOS and Android. In 2014, the team started working on Guns, Gore & Cannoli and launched this game on Steam, Xbox One, PS4 and Nintendo Switch in 2015. After a successful release, they continued working on the sequel to the game and launched Guns, Gore and Cannoli 2 in 2018 on the same platforms. They teamed up with Warcave in 2018 to develop the real-time strategy game War Party, which was released on Steam, Xbox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch in 2019 * Empire: The Deck Building Strategy Game (2013, iOS) * Guns, Gore & Cannoli: Launch: April 30, 2015 on Steam * Guns, Gore and Cannoli 2 * War Party * Hidden Through Time * Warhammer 40,000: Shootas, Blood & Teef (2022) * Hidden Through Time 2: Myths and Magic (2023 TBD) == References == == Other websites == * * Guns, Gore and Cannoli Official Site Category:Video game companies
